issue.title: [C++] Add "parse_strptime" function for string to timestamp conversions using the kernels framework
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8937](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8937). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should be relatively straightforward to implement using the new kernels framework
